0.question: How does the game work?
0.answer: DinnerSpinner is a real-time social wheel game powered by PUBG items. It works just like the classic money wheel games that can be found on the gaming floors of land based casinos, which are hugely popular given that they are based entirely on luck and require no special skills or strategy to play. All you need to do is place a bet on where you think the wheel will spin to a stop and wait for the spin. If the wheel stops on your chosen number, you become an instant winner.

1.question: How do I play?
1.answer: The Wheel is separated into 54 colourful segments numbered 1, 2, 5, 10, 20 and 40. Once you have funded your on site balance, all you need to do is click the betting chip with the amount you're comfortable betting with, and then choose the number you wish to bet on. If any bets are found in the game, the countdown is started. When it reaches zero, the wheel will spin and stop on a field, determining whether you are a winner. If you’re lucky enough to win, your winning money will automatically be credited to your account. After each spin, you will have the option to bet again, or leave the game. If you’re feeling sociable, you can chat with other like-minded players on the right-hand side of the screen.

2.question: How much can I win?
2.answer: Our game has a theoretical RTP (return to player) of 95.58%, with minimum bets starting at just {{minBet}}, making it suitable for recreational punters and high rollers. The amount you can win on the money wheel depends on the size of your bet and the number you have bet on. Each number appears on the wheel a different number of times, with the less frequently occurring numbers resulting in the highest payouts. Your winnings are calculated like so: your bet * the field + your bet. Its simple!

3.question: What are those multipliers?
3.answer: When the wheel rolls 2x or 7x, your bets are multiplied by that field and the wheel is spun again. These can stack on top of eachother leading to masive jackpot rounds!

4.question: Can I play on my phone/tablet?
4.answer: Of course! Dinner Spinner uses cutting-edge PWA technology allowing you to install the website on your phone to enjoy Dinner Spinner in its fullscreen glory! The website is fully responsive down to 320px device width, enjoy Dinner Spinner at home or on the go, the quality never changes.

5.question: What is max profit?
5.answer: The max profit property is a limit on how much profit you can make per round. This limit is currently set to {{limit}}, meaning if your winnings are higher than {{limit}}, you get {{limit}} + your bet added to your balance.

6.question: Are there chat rules?
6.answer: Yes! They can be found under the send button of where you type your message.

7.question: How do I deposit?
7.answer: Start by setting up your Steam URL by clicking on your profile name (top right), then click settings. Click on the “Deposit” tab or the + next to your balance, select the skins you would like to deposit and click the deposit button. A bot will then send you a trade offer with your selected item(s) and a security code. Make sure you match this with the one on the sidebar! Once all steps are completed, your balance will be credited and you're ready to play.

8.question: How are the prices determined?
8.answer: We use an external pricing service and our own overrides. Prices are taken from market averages and some small variations to keep the trades fair.

9.question: How do I withdraw my balance?
9.answer: You can withdraw your balance through the withdraw button in the navbar. You are then presented with a wide range of items that you can add to your cart. Are you looking for something specific? We have a filter for that, play around and select what best suits your needs.

10.question: I have a problem, what do I do?
10.answer: Don't worry! If your problem isn't answered by one of these FAQ questions, you can contact support! If our support is online at the time being, you will be put into a live chat with them automatically to resolve your issue right away. If we are offline, your ticket will receive a response within 48 hours. Please be patient and only send one ticket per issue.

11.question: What happens if I get disconnected?
11.answer: No problem. Did you place a bet? If yes, your bet will go through like normal and any winnings will then be added to your balance. If didn't, there's is nothing to worry about, you will be reconnected as soon as you have an active internet connection. The website will show you a message alerting you to the fact, so don't ever worry.

12.question: The game is lagging!
12.answer: Is your pc or mobile device up to standard? Although we try our best to cater to all devices some devices may not cut it. Make sure you are running the latest version of your browser and that your browser is modern. If that still doesn't cut it, please check the Game Settings (found in your settings) to turn on various performance features.

13.question: Was that spin fair?
13.answer: Absolutely. DinnerSpinner has one of the best provably fair systems out there. Check out the Provably Fair page (found in our footer) for more info!

14.question: I'm interested in a sponsorhip, how do I get sponsored?
14.answer: Do you have a large social media following? If you do, please contact our Twitter DM's. A link to our twitter can be found in the footer.

15.question: What if I can't stop playing?
15.answer: Please play responsibly, always take a break and never spend what you can't. If any of these issues arise please seek help from these links and seek help from a qualified individual. Gamblers Anonymous: http://www.gamblersanonymous.org/ga/

rules.title: Chat Rules
rules.description: Please read these rules carefully before posting in chatrooms.

list.2: Don't spam, harass or be offensive to other players. Respect eachother.
list.3: Don't discuss or promote trades you’re offering.
list.4: Don't advertise other services or websites, including youtube/twitch channels.
list.6: Don't post inappropriate links, it will result in a ban.

rules.warning: Breaking any of these rules will result in a purge/mute/ban. You have been warned.

chat.agree: You must agree to the chat rules before sending messages.

deposit.title: Your Inventory
deposit.description: This is your Steam inventory. Select up to {limit} items you want to deposit at once. Once deposited they are automatically turned into site balance. Make sure steam is online before sending your trade!

buttons.tooltip: Tip: Right click (hold on mobile) to clear all bets.

entries.noBets: No bets yet, be the first!

max.title: Maximum Table Limit Reached
max.text: The sum of your bets cannot exceed ${amount}.

0.title: Welcome to DinnerSpinner!
0.text: Let's show you around the game so you can become a pro right away.

1.title: Bet Interface
1.text: This is the bet interface. You use it to participate in the game.

2.title: Bet Chips
2.text: First, click on a chip with a comfortable amount to bet with.

3.title: Fields
3.text: You can now bet on as many fields as you please. Each field pays your bet times the field's number plus your bet. If you have some balance, go ahead and try it out, your bets won't be sent.

4.title: Undo, Double, Repeat
4.text: You can bet on all fields, undo, double or repeat your bets with ease.

5.title: Example
5.text: A little complicated? If you bet $10 on 5, you have the chance to win $50 + your $10 bet back. See, it's easy!

6.title: Countdown & Round Info
6.text: Make sure you finish all your bets before the countdown hits 0! You can also see the round status here.

7.title: The Wheel
7.text: There it is, the wheel in all its glory. Once the countdown hits 0, it will start spinning and land on a field. Let's spin it.

8.title: Multiplier Rounds
8.text: What are those 2x/7x fields, you ask? Your key to a potential jackpot! When a multiplier field is hit, the wheel will spin again and multiply every field by 2x/7x.

9.title: While the wheel is spinning..
9.text: On a multiplier round, the field's payouts are multiplied by the multiplier. Since we hit 2x, this means your $50 could now turn into $100 (+ $10). Multiplier rounds can even stack, allowing for crazy jackpots.

10.title: That's it!
10.text: You now know how DinnerSpinner works. If you have any more questions, check out the Help page!

11.title: Didn't catch everything?
11.text: You can always restart the tour here. Have fun!

help.title: Help & Support
help.description: Is something broken? Don't understand how the game works? No worries, read through our FAQ.
help.descriptionOnline: Our live support agents are online to help you in case the FAQ doesn't answer your question.
help.descriptionOffline: You can also contact us if the FAQ leaves you wanting more. Your ticket will be answered as soon as possible.

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.description: Ready to collect your profits? Cashout your balance for PUBG items!
